attributes.action: The covid passport should be extended to include 12 - 15 year-olds.
attributes.additional_details: This issue will directly affect my family's plans for Christmas and the new year. My children are both double vaccinated but, absurdly, cannot prove their status as such.
attributes.background: The government should make it possible for people in the stated age group to add their vaccination details to the nhs app, making foreign travel and accessing services such as ski lifts and restaurants problem free.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596335
